quest.name: Dangerous Work
journal:
 Quest Sync
The sprightly Loporrit has lost track of their friends, and could use a helping hand.
objectives: Search for and aid wayward Loporrits.

dialogue.name: BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: You're that visitor everyone's been talking about. I don't suppose you have time to assist me in a matter of life and death?

dialogue.name: BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: Four of my friends went out to patrol the moon and mine for ore. They should be back by now, but... Well, I'm worried something happened!

dialogue.name: BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: I can't say I'm too keen on the idea of coming face-to-facelike-growth with one of those roving fungi by myself, though. Could you come along? Please come along...

dialogue.name: BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: Thank you! Let's hop to it, then. My friends were headed toward the Chlorophosgrot.

dialogue.name: BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: Sweet Mother Hydaelyn! I hope they're all right...

dialogue.name: DIZZYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: ...Guh? Wha? Why are you...?

dialogue.name: DIZZYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: I-I'm not slacking! I, erm...passed out after a weeper ambushed me. Yes, that's definitely what happened.

dialogue.name: DIZZYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: If you're looking for the others, they went ahead to survey the Chlorophosgrot and the area around the Cradle of Darkness. I'd get them myself, but I'm much too laz─er, that is, exhausted from my encounter with the weeper.

dialogue.name: DIZZYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: The others are either there in the Chlorophosgrot or near the Cradle of Darkness... I'm sure they're fine, though. They're nowhere near as, uh...exhausted...as I am.

dialogue.name: BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: ...Do you hear intermittent snoring?

dialogue.name: PLUMPLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: This hole sure is deep. Drop a rock in there, and you'll never hear it hit the bottom...

dialogue.name: PLUMPLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: Oh, it's you! Is something the matter?

dialogue.name: PLUMPLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: Eep! Sorry for the bother─I didn't realize I'd been gone so long. I'll head back right away.

dialogue.name: PLUMPLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: Mining makes me so...so sleepy. Must...stay...awake...

dialogue.name: PLUMPLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: ...Hmmm? Oh, is it time to go back already? I hardly got anything done. Oh well!

dialogue.name: NUMBLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: I'm sure this plant wasn't here last time... Well, would you look at that, it's made my paw all tingly. Numb, even... Surely there's some use for this!

dialogue.name: NUMBLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: Goodness me! Time to head back, is it? I was so focused, I completely lost track of time.

dialogue.name: PLUMPLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: How far down could that hole go, I wonder?

dialogue.name: PLUMPLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: <yawn> Maybe I'll get some proper mining done next time.

dialogue.name: NUMBLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: I can't feel my arm now. But it still moves, so it's fine, right? ...Right?

dialogue.name: DIZZYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: I feel much better after that brief and totally regulation-compliant break. Let's head back and sift through the spoils of our expedition!

dialogue.name: BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: I hope they don't think you're impressed by their shenanigans... <sigh> Honestly!

dialogue.name: BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: Thanks again for helping me round everyone up. I'm glad no one was hurt...

dialogue.name: BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: They were lucky this time, but with those fungi and other odd creatures out there, I think we'll have to reconsider our patrol routes from now on. For a mercy, there are plenty of places to mine for ore nearby.

dialogue.name: BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249
dialogue.text: Before you go, I'd like you to have this. Don't be a stranger!
